info.title: Asaancar API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for Asaancar - Car rental and pick & drop service platform

get.description: Get a paginated list of all cars for admin (no store filtering)
Get detailed information about a specific car for admin
Get car statistics for admin dashboard
Get all available filters for cars (brands, types, stores) for admin
Get a list of active areas, optionally filtered by city
Get a paginated list of contact messages (admin only)

post.description: Submit a new contact message

message.example: I would like to inquire about...

get.description: Get statistics for contact messages (admin only)

post.description: Upload a single image to S3 storage

image.description: Image file (jpeg, png, jpg, gif, webp, max 2MB)

delete.description: Delete an image from S3 storage

post.description: Upload multiple images to S3 storage (max 10 images)

get.description: Get a paginated list of active pick and drop services with optional filters

post.description: Create a new pick and drop service

get.summary: Get pick and drop service details
get.description: Get detailed information about a specific pick and drop service

put.description: Update an existing pick and drop service (only owner can update)

delete.description: Delete a pick and drop service (only owner can delete)

get.summary: Get user's pick and drop services
get.description: Get a paginated list of the authenticated user's pick and drop services
Get the authenticated user's information
Get user statistics for admin dashboard

post.description: Authenticate user with email/phone and password
Destroy the authenticated session and revoke the access token
Confirm the user's password before sensitive operations
Reset user password using the reset token
Send OTP via email or SMS for user login
Verify OTP and authenticate user
Send OTP via email or SMS for new user registration
Verify OTP for new user registration. Must be called before /api/register
Set or update password for a user (optional, can be done after OTP login)
Send a password reset link to the user's email

200.description: Reset link sent if account exists

message.example: A reset link will be sent if the account exists.

post.description: Register a new user account. OTP must be verified first using /api/verify-signup-otp

422.description: Validation error or OTP not verified

get.description: Get a list of conversations for the authenticated user

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by conversation type (rental, booking, store, pick_and_drop)

post.description: Create a new conversation for a booking, store, user, or pick and drop service

get.description: Get all messages for a conversation and mark them as read

post.description: Send a message in a conversation

message.example: Hello, I'm interested in this car

get.description: Get a paginated list of bookings for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new booking

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific booking

put.description: Update booking status and notes (only owner can update)

delete.description: Cancel a booking (only owner can cancel)

get.description: Get booking statistics for user's stores

post.description: Check if a car is available for the specified date range
Calculate the total price for a booking based on car, dates, and duration type
Create a booking for an unauthenticated guest user

get.description: Returns list of car brands with pagination
Returns list of cars with pagination

post.description: Creates a new car record

get.description: Returns car data by ID

get.summary: Get car information with offer form data
get.description: Returns car data by ID with additional data needed for offer form
Returns cars belonging to authenticated user's stores only
Returns cars from all stores (public endpoint)
Get a list of car models, optionally filtered by brand
Get a list of car models for a specific brand
Returns list of car offers with pagination

post.description: Creates a new car offer record

get.description: Returns car offer data by ID

put.description: Updates car offer data by ID

get.description: Returns list of car types with pagination
Get a list of all cities
Get a list of active colors
Returns list of stores with pagination

post.description: Creates a new store record

get.description: Returns store data by ID
Returns all stores belonging to authenticated user
Get a list of active years

put.description: Update the authenticated user's password. Current password is required only if user has a password set.

current_password.description: Required only if user has a password

patch.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information

get.description: Get the VAPID public key for web push notification subscription

post.description: Store the push subscription for the authenticated user

car_id.description: ID of the car to book

user_id.description: ID of the user making the booking

description.example: A reliable car for daily use

car_id.description: ID of the car for the offer

description.example: A reliable car for daily use

sanctum.description: Enter token in format (Bearer <token>). Get your token from /api/login or /api/register endpoints.
